name: single-spa-examples
description: This is an example of examples on how to use [single-spa](https://github.com/joeldenning/single-spa) in a variety of contexts. Right now there are examples with the following technologies:

scripts.build: rimraf build && rm -rf build && yarn build-ember-1 && yarn build-ember-2 && yarn build-ember-3 && yarn build-ember-4 && yarn build-vanilla && yarn build-webpack
scripts.build-ember-1: mv .babelrc tmp/ && cd src/ember-1 && npm cache clean && bower cache clean && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf bower_components && npm install && bower install && ./node_modules/.bin/ember build --output-path ../../build/ember-1/ && cd ../.. && mv tmp/.babelrc ./
scripts.build-ember-2: cd src/ember-2 && npm cache clean && bower cache clean && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf bower_components && npm install && bower install && ./node_modules/.bin/ember build --output-path ../../build/ember-2/ && cd ../..
scripts.build-ember-3: cd src/ember-3 && npm cache clean && rm -rf node_modules && npm install && ./node_modules/.bin/ember build --output-path ../../build/ember-3/ && cd ../..
scripts.build-ember-4: cd src/ember-4 && npm cache clean && rm -rf node_modules && npm install && ./node_modules/.bin/ember build --output-path ../../build/ember-4/ && cd ../..
scripts.build-vanilla: cpx "src/vanillajs/**" build/vanillajs && cpx "node_modules/todomvc-app-css/*" build/todomvc-app-css && cpx "node_modules/todomvc-common/*" build/todomvc-common

author: Joel Denning
